questions.question: Are you satisfied with your current job?
questions.name: questionOne

questions.question: Are you satisfied with your current role and responsibilities?
questions.name: questionTwo

questions.question: Do you feel valued and appreciated by your team and organization?
questions.name: questionThree

questions.question: Are you provided with sufficient opportunities for professional growth and development?
questions.name: questionFour

questions.question: Do you feel motivated and engaged in your work? If not, what factors contribute to your lack of motivation?
questions.name: questionFive

questions.question: What is your preferred mode of transportation to work?
questions.name: questionSix
